Key Match Events: Klay Thompson tied the game at 47-47 with a basket with 4:58 left in the second quarter.
Thompson scored back-to-back 3-pointers and dished an assist to Naji Marshall to tie the game at 67 apiece.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Dallas Mavericks dropped to 4-3 with the loss.
Others: The Mavericks faced the Chicago Bulls next in their home stand.
